Description:
The werewolves who decided to fight for the kingdom gathered at the watchtower near the forest.

There, a commander of the human army decided to form a special advance platoon, composed entirely of werewolves. Since we knew the terrain and it would be easier for us to advance through the forest.

After forming the platoon, he told us that he needed a captain, someone trustworthy and capable of leading us.
